name: Only Guns
description:
Imagine, that you are in a crazy parallel world. Somewhere outside of the ideology of game developers, under the moonlight there is a cartoon cuddly tiny town. There are peaceful residents, friendly pals, the police, special forces with military forces, what protects citizens, arrest criminals and killers. There is transport, its own logistics, road interchanges, rules of road traffic. Also, here is cuddly arsenal with weapons and guns to protect from the enemies. Cuddly tiny town has it own treasures and secrets, that you should dug. The biggest secret of this cuddly world is the fact that all its residents, including children, toddler, the elderly are weapons...guns. In the literal sense of the word. This is real guns tend! Burst of freak!

Who you are or what you want to become - it doesn't matter, it's important that you can be a gun in this cuddly arsenal under the moonlight, with all gunz and boom! You should gather guns to be real weird marksman. Dig and dig until you dug them all.

Prepare your finger for the first brand-new epic shooter simulator, abnormal and unusual enough that it will drag you on for a long time. This is weird marksman spit: gather guns tend, you are Welcome!

In "Gather guns tend" all you need to become weird marksman is simply split the guns. Kill enemies and gather guns - this is your mission, simplicity. This is real gather guns tend! Burst of fun!

When you split or kill someone - gather coins and experience from splitted (killed) gun. Split enemies like rifle-policeman, machine gun special forces, carbine military soldier or automatic federal pistol. Collect coins, experience, bring weird marksman spit and your skills to perfection. Explode cars, crash the box, destroy builds to gather you want.
Spend coins, collect guns in cuddly arsenal to get boost and priority. In a store you will find many perks, gunz and boom's, improvements that will help when you split the guns, or made quests more fun, crazy or weird. Dig the town in the name glory, reputation and treasures.

This is more interesting than tamagotchi. Refute that you are not tiny baby or little todler. Are you toddler? I hope no. Show your score to your pals in "Weird marksman spit: gather guns tend", get respect from them. Dug like Doug to find secret place and treasures in a cartoon cuddly tiny town under the moonlight.

Kill the bazookas and machine guns with a large margin of health. Eliminate all the barefoot miniguns. The more guns and weapons you will kill, the higher your level will be. This will allow you to choose more cool stuff, get special perks, weapon upgrades, gunz and boom. Upgrade weapons - improve the weird marksman spit. It's like a deathmatch with a stepped development of the protagonist.

In "Weird marksman spit: gather guns tend" you be able to play as pistol, SMG, rifle, machine gun, minigun, desert eagle, grenade, revolver AWP, shotgun, colt, magnum, fireflame, bazooka, rocket launcher etc. Bullet is your blood, metal is your skin, cuddly arsenal is your home.
